name: derbyshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in the central part of England: He comes from Matlock, in Derbyshire.
More examplesFewer examplesMuch of the film was shot on location in Derbyshire, England.Long Eaton is a village on the outskirts of Nottingham, just over the Derbyshire border. Eyam is a rural Derbyshire village whose rector persuaded residents to voluntarily quarantine themselves during the plague.Chatsworth House is located in the heart of the Derbyshire countryside.
